1324560.name: Krum - Battle Arena
1324560.description:
KRUM – Battle Arena is a fun, competitive, asynchronous hack-and-slash parody game.

If you're looking for a deep story or triple-A features, you've come to the wrong place. This game is made from our hearts and souls (yes, just souls—imagine that without the "dark" in front!). We still have a long way to go before it looks like a polished game. Are you still in? ;)

A Barbaric Arena Fighting Game [With a Pinch of Parody]

It features a "unique combat system" (yeah, right) that is simple to learn but tricky to master, all while being as funny and humorous as possible. Each weapon offers easy-to-execute but brutal combos. Bla-bla-bla... just try it and see for yourself!

Players' Goals

Players choose a country and then fight for control of multiple arenas in the Panoria World (currently, two arenas are available). The goal is to survive all waves in each arena by battling gruesome enemies and blood-thirsty monsters.

Winning ranks players in various leaderboards—both personal and representing their country.

A win also unlocks a special area where players can upgrade their arena defenders. The higher-ranking country owns the arena.

Conquering, dominating, and defending all arenas in the Panoria World is the ultimate goal for players from each fighting country.
